howToGetIt: To speak with us about treatment options, call the clinic at (415) 565-7667. The front desk staff will take down your information and a nurse or provider will call you back within 24 hours to evaluate you for a Paxlovid prescription If you call outside of clinic hours, select option 3 to speak with our on-call answering services. Let them know that you are calling for urgent COVID-19 treatment and they will connect you with our on-call provider who can evaluate you for a Paxlovid prescription.
